title: [QUESTION] How to pack  SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.nupkg  and   HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.nupkg  in  native Linux environment?
body:
Hello! 
    I want to pack SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.nupkg  and  HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.nupkg  on my  native Linux environment.
    But  I  don't  know  the  pack  step  of  how  to  generate  these  two  nupkg.  Could you please give me some advice on how to generate  these  two  nupkg  on Linux environment? 

Thanks!
